This week at Mobile World Congress Adobe has been showing off Flash Player 10.1 on a variety of mobile devices. Here is a video I shot today showing how Flex applications can run on mobile devices with Flash Player 10.1 and how existing applications can be tweaked for the size constraints of these devices.
